verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [V: announced] [ARG1: a new policy that would bar clinics who provide abortion services or referrals from receiving federal grants under Title X.]
President Trump announced a new policy that [V: would] bar clinics who provide abortion services or referrals from receiving federal grants under Title X.
